Added a What's New panel to keep you informed about system improvements.

Improved how timestamps are displayed in the Recent Activity feed.

Optimized large schedule saves to be more reliable.

Improved system resilience for more reliable schedule updates.
Fixed an issue where the app could briefly show a blank screen while loading schedule data.
Fixed a bug where Edit All Teams could incorrectly report no changes to save.

Launched a fresh, modern interface for the schedule manager.
Added safeguards to prevent duplicate updates when saving schedules.
Improved deployment reliability to prevent service interruptions.
